Title: Four Days in September
Actors: Alan Arkin, Fernanda Torres, Pedro Cardoso, Luiz Fernando Guimarães
Plot: Fernando, a journalist, and his friend César join terrorist group MR8 in order to fight Brazilian dictatorial regime during the late sixties. Cesare, however, is wounded and captured during a bank hold up. Fernando then decides to kidnap the American ambassador in Brazil and ask for the release of fifteen political prisoners in exchange for his life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.
Production: Pandora Cinema, Filmes do Equador, Sony Corporation of America
